content.text: You can search for properties using cadastral numbers, addresses, or place names.

title: Tip 2: Use map layers for more information

content.text: Kartverket provides several map layers that you can toggle on and off to display different types of information:
Use the measurement tool to calculate distances or areas directly on the map.

items: Click the ruler icon in the toolbar.
Choose between distance or area measurement.
Click on the map to start measuring.

content.text: The result will appear at the bottom of the map, and you can clear the measurement when finished.
When you find an interesting area on the map, you can easily share it with others:

items: Use the “Share” button at the top of the map view.
Paste it into an email or message.

content.text: The recipient will see the same map area and active layers as you.
Kartverket provides many open datasets that you can download for free from Geonorge.

items: Search for the dataset you are interested in
Select the file format that best suits your needs (for example GML, GeoJSON, or Shapefile)

content.text: Remember to read the license terms for any data you use in your own projects.
